name: ChargeItemDefinition
title: ChargeItemDefinition
description: The ChargeItemDefinition resource provides the properties that apply to the (billing) codes necessary to calculate costs and prices. The properties may differ largely depending on type and realm, therefore this resource gives only a rough structure and requires profiling for each type of billing code system.

elements.name: ChargeItemDefinition
elements.description: The ChargeItemDefinition resource provides the properties that apply to the (billing) codes necessary to calculate costs and prices.

elements.name: url
elements.description: An absolute URI that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A formal identifier that is used to identify this charge item definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

elements.name: version
elements.description: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the charge item definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance.

elements.name: title
elements.description: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the charge item definition.

elements.name: derivedFromUri
elements.description: The URL pointing to an externally-defined charge item definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this definition.

elements.name: partOf
elements.description: A larger definition of which this particular definition is a component or step.

elements.name: replaces
elements.description: As new versions of a protocol or guideline are defined, allows identification of what versions are replaced by a new instance.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The current state of this charge item definition.

elements.name: experimental
elements.description: A Boolean value to indicate that this charge item definition is authored for testing purposes and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

elements.name: date
elements.description: The date (and optionally time) when the charge item definition was published.

elements.name: publisher
elements.description: The name of the organization or individual that published the charge item definition.

elements.name: contact
elements.description: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

elements.name: description
elements.description: A free text natural language description of the charge item definition from a consumer's perspective.

elements.name: useContext
elements.description: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed.

elements.name: jurisdiction
elements.description: A legal or geographic region in which the charge item definition is intended to be used.

elements.name: copyright
elements.description: A copyright statement relating to the charge item definition and/or its contents.

elements.name: approvalDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher.

elements.name: lastReviewDate
elements.description: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed.

elements.name: effectivePeriod
elements.description: The period during which the charge item definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

elements.name: code
elements.description: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given billing code.

elements.name: instance
elements.description: The defined billing details in this resource pertain to the given product instance(s).

elements.name: applicability
elements.description: Expressions that describe applicability criteria for the billing code.

elements.name: propertyGroup
elements.description: Group of properties which are applicable under the same conditions.
